info.aspect_ratio: “Default” option will automatically stretch to contain the content or background.
info.aspect_ratio_mobile: Mobile will default to use the aspect ratio setting above unless updated here
info.autoplay_video: Will automatically play the video when a user scrolls to it; will pause when user scrolls past it.
info.background_image_mobile: Mobile will use background image above unless overwritten here
info.background_video: Upload or use a video file from your store’s [files](/admin/settings/files). [Learn more](https://companyxyz.io/blogs/blocks/video#encoding) about best practices for video files.
info.blog: Posts from the selected blog will be displayed
info.body_font: Primary font used throughout the site, including subheadings and card badges.
info.button_font: Used for all buttons on the site
info.caption_font: The small text seen above section headings
info.card_button_type_settings_product: Will show an ‘Add to cart’ button if the product is available and does not have multiple variants. A ‘View product’ button will display if the product has multiple variants, or if this setting is unchecked.
info.collage_style: “Large block on left” setting will display the first block as large; “large block on right” will display the second block as large. If a block is being used as the “large” block, this will override aspect ratio settings within that block.
info.collection_badges: Cards within the selected collections will display a “badge” in the corner of the product card.
info.custom_font_family_body: Enter the full font-family value, as provided by your font provider. If using a hosted font, the format can be written as: font-family: 'family-name', serif;
info.custom_font_family_button: Enter the full font-family value, as provided by your font provider. If using a hosted font, the format can be written as: font-family: 'family-name', serif;
info.custom_font_family_caption: Enter the full font-family value, as provided by your font provider. If using a hosted font, the format can be written as: font-family: 'family-name', serif;
info.custom_font_hosted_family_name: Enter the font name if using a hosted font
info.custom_font_hosted_woff: Enter the url to your .woff font file
info.custom_font_service: Enter the <link> code from your font provider, e.g. Google Fonts or Typekit
info.custom_liquid: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.
info.default_results: The top-level items from this menu will be displayed in the search window’s main container.
info.editor_title_banner: Displayed as the block or section title in the theme editor’s sidebar
info.editor_title_search: Displayed as the block or section title in the theme editor’s sidebar
info.enable_follow_on_shop: Follow on Shop allows customers to follow your store on the Shopify Shop app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)
info.enable_sticky_header: Section header will “stick” to top of page on scroll. Recommended when an accordion has a lot of content or many rows.
info.expandable: If checked, block will display the first four lines of text, and will allow users to expand to view the entire description.
info.featured_image_mobile: Mobile will use background image above unless overwritten here
info.featured_video: Video will autoplay and will be muted. Be mindful of your video size and bitrate! [Learn more](https://companyxyz.io/blogs/settings/background-and-featured-videos)
info.fill_available_space: Stretch this block to fill remaining space in the row. [Learn more](https://companyxyz.io/blogs/settings/fill-available-space)
info.filter_tags: Comma-separated list of tags; each tag will create a filter.
info.hosted_video_url_og: Enter the url of a video uploaded to your [store files](/admin/settings/files) or another hosting provider. Pro-tip: be careful of your file size and/or bitrate — this video will not get re-compressed!
info.icon: Enter the [icon name](https://fonts.google.com/icons) you would like to show. Leave blank to hide the icon. [Learn more](https://companyxyz.io/blogs/settings/icon)
info.icon_bolt: Enter the [icon name](https://fonts.google.com/icons) you would like to show. Leave blank to hide the icon. [Learn more](https://companyxyz.io/blogs/settings/icon)
info.icon_email: Enter the [icon name](https://fonts.google.com/icons) you would like to show. Leave blank to hide the icon. [Learn more](https://companyxyz.io/blogs/settings/icon)
info.icon_feature: Enter the [icon name](https://fonts.google.com/icons) you would like to show. Leave blank to hide the icon. [Learn more](https://companyxyz.io/blogs/settings/icon)
info.icon_rich_text: Enter the [icon name](https://fonts.google.com/icons) you would like to show. Leave blank to hide the icon. [Learn more](https://companyxyz.io/blogs/settings/icon)
info.icon_separator: Enter the [icon name](https://fonts.google.com/icons) you would like to show between breadcrumb items. Leave blank to hide the icon. [Learn more](https://companyxyz.io/blogs/settings/icon)
info.inactive_overlay_color: Overlay shows on top of inactive slides; will become transparent when this slide becomes active.
info.intro_accordion: For stacked, expandable information tabs. Used for FAQs, additional details, etc.
info.intro_account_icon: Clicking this icon will navigate to a user’s account or login page.
info.intro_banner_settings: Displays a custom banner for each menu item.
info.intro_banner_settings_search: Optional. Creates a custom banner within the search window.
info.intro_block_accordion: For stacked, expandable information tabs. Used for FAQs, additional details, etc. The row’s content can be pulled from a blog post or page, or by updating the row’s content setting directly.
info.intro_block_add_to_cart_button: Displays an “add to cart” button with various additional settings.
info.intro_block_banner: Flexible block to create custom banners/promotions for any type of information.
info.intro_block_blog_post: Display an article card with a posts’s title, featured image, excerpt, and a link to read more. Use a banner block if you would like to override any of these variables.
info.intro_block_breadcrumb: This will add a static “parent” link to your breadcrumbs.
info.intro_block_breadcrumbs: A hierarchical list of links, typically used at the top of a page. Allows users to navigate to “parent” pages, blogs, or collections.
info.intro_block_cart: Displays a cart icon in the main navigation. Reference theme settings for miscellaneous display options.
info.intro_block_collection_banner: Display custom banners within the collection grid. It is required for the collection to have at least 6 products for a large banner to be displayed, or 11 products for a small banner to be displayed.
info.intro_block_custom_asset: Adds a custom CSS or JavaScript file into your template, e.g. to implement an external service. Include the full asset tag here, e.g. include the <script> tags for JavaScript or the <link> tags for CSS.
info.intro_block_custom_css: This will insert custom CSS into your template, e.g. to override a specific theme setting or theme CSS rule. Insert CSS *without* the style tags into the code field below.
info.intro_block_custom_javascript: This will insert custom JavaScript into your template, e.g. to add an embedded form or service. Insert JavaScript *without* the script tags into the code field below.
info.intro_block_filter_group: Create custom tag-based filter groups. Each block will appear as its own expandable module; multiple blocks will be stacked vertically.
info.intro_block_follow_on_shop_button: The Follow on Shop button allows customers to follow your store on the Shopify Shop app. When a customer follows your store, they can receive personalized recommendations and notifications about your products. This helps you to create a more personalized shopping experience for your customers. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)
info.intro_block_footer_content: Displays various storefront content within the footer. Generally used to tell users more about the storefront.
info.intro_block_footer_menu: Displays a [navigation menu](/admin/menus) in a simple list format.
info.intro_block_form: Displays the default Shopify contact form.
info.intro_block_icon_with_text: Customizable icon with text, typically used for highlighting key features or unique selling points.
info.intro_block_logo: This will show your store name if no logo is set here.
info.intro_block_product: Will display a product card with a product’s title, featured image, excerpt, and a link to learn more. Use a promo block if you would like to override any of these variables.
info.intro_block_product_benefits: Highlight up to three features or benefits; all settings are optional.
info.intro_block_product_description: Displays a product’s primary description with various settings.
info.intro_block_product_price: Displays a product’s price with various settings.
info.intro_block_product_reviews: Displays a product’s review summary. Works with the official [Shopify reviews app](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews). Will not show if app is not installed or product has no reviews.
info.intro_block_product_title: Displays your product’s title with various settings.
info.intro_block_quantity_selector: Displays interface for selecting quantity to add to cart.
info.intro_block_row: The row’s content can be pulled from a blog post or page, or by updating the row’s content setting directly.
info.intro_block_share-print_ui: Displays UI for share and print functionality.
info.intro_block_slide: Displays a slide with various text and imagery options.
info.intro_block_social_media_icons: Displays icons for all social media accounts added to theme settings.
info.intro_block_testimonial: Display a customer testimonial and link to the related product.
info.intro_block_variant_selector: Displays interface for selecting a product’s variant options. Will not show if no variant options exist.
info.intro_block_video: A block to display Youtube, Vimeo, or externally hosted video.
info.intro_button: Creates a button with various display options.
info.intro_cart_announcement: Generally used to provide a final reassurance for your customer, such as a safety guarantee or free returns policy. Clear setting fields to hide.
info.intro_content_settings: Use any or all of these settings to display the information needed.
info.intro_editor_settings: Optional. Used to customize your theme editor experience.
info.intro_empty_cart_settings: Entice users to add items to their cart.
info.intro_gallery_settings: Various settings for displaying a product’s imagery.
info.intro_header_settings: Use header settings to introduce the section and/or provide structure to your page.
info.intro_imagery_settings: Optional. Add imagery here to change the look and feel of your block.
info.intro_main_menu: Displays a standard menu with automatic dropdown menus if applicable. [Learn more](https://companyxyz.io/blogs/blocks/main-menu)
info.intro_mega_menu: Displays a navigation item and menu as a single mega menu. Add multiple mega menu items to create a robust navigation. Additional configuration is recommended. [Learn more](https://companyxyz.io/blogs/blocks/mega-menu)
info.intro_navigation_item: Displays a navigation item and menu with various settings.
info.intro_search_window: Settings for the modal window which opens when a user clicks into the search field.
info.intro_section_announcement_bar: Sitewide alert or announcement and secondary navigation above the main header.
info.intro_section_article_grid: A grid of articles (i.e. blog posts) with various display settings. Results can be pulled from a specific blog, tag, or by adding article blocks.
info.intro_section_banner: Full-width banner for any type of promotion or information. Use the multicolumn section if you would like to show multiple banners in a row.
info.intro_section_blog_content: Displays a blog’s content with various display settings.
info.intro_section_blog_posts: A list of blog posts with various display settings. Results can be pulled from a specific blog, tag, or by adding article blocks.
info.intro_section_breadcrumbs: A hierarchical list of links which helps users to navigate to “parent” pages. Typically used at the top of a page.
info.intro_section_breadcrumbs_block_info: Use breadcrumb blocks to create custom parent links. This can be used to create the appearance of a sub-collection or sub-blog.
info.intro_section_buttons: A group of buttons with miscellaneous display settings.
info.intro_section_cart: Will show a customer’s cart items if any have been added; empty cart messaging will show if no items have been added.
info.intro_section_collage: Two column section with “collage” layout style.
info.intro_section_collection: A grid of products with miscellaneous display settings. Results will be pulled from the current/active collection.
info.intro_section_collection_list: A grid or slideshow of collection(s). Use a featured products section to show specific products.
info.intro_section_comments: Displays your article comments. Can be used in place of the article content setting if you’d like your comments elsewhere on the page.
info.intro_section_contact_form: Used to display a contact form and additional contact information. Reorder blocks to change layout.
info.intro_section_custom_code: This will add custom CSS or JavaScript into the template, e.g. to override theme styles or to add embeddable forms or services.
info.intro_section_custom_liquid: This will add custom liquid code into the current template, e.g. for Shopify apps or to show metafields in your frontend.
info.intro_section_email_signup: Simple system to capture email addresses for newsletter or lead generation.
info.intro_section_featured_collection: A grid or slideshow of products within collection(s). Use a featured products section to show specific products.
info.intro_section_featured_product: Flexible featured product section containing a product’s title, key information, metadata, variants, and add to cart button. Create custom layouts with various available blocks.
info.intro_section_featured_products: A grid or slideshow of specific products. Use a featured collection section to automatically pull products from a collection.
info.intro_section_features_bar: For displaying various announcements, features, or important notes.
info.intro_section_features_bar_theme_setting: Theme settings will be shown in this section by default. Overwrite theme settings by adding one or more Feature blocks to the section. [Learn more](https://companyxyz.io/blogs/sections/features-bar)
info.intro_section_footer: Displays footer content with various settings for end-of-page metadata and menus.
info.intro_section_heading: Pre-styled headings to be used for structured page layouts. Important for SEO. Be careful to not use multiple h1’s!
info.intro_section_hero: Similar to a banner, but comprised of custom blocks. Generally used to create the top-most section of a page.
info.intro_section_hero_basic: Used to show the page title and key information at the top of a page. Will display featured image if available.
info.intro_section_image: Flexible image section with miscellaneous display settings.
info.intro_section_image_with_text: Displays an image next to rich text. Change the order of the blocks to adjust layout.
info.intro_section_login_form: The primary login form to access a user account.
info.intro_section_logo_list: A simple list of custom logos.
info.intro_section_multicolumn: A flexible column system comprised of various blocks.
info.intro_section_navigation: The primary header and navigation system. Displayed on all pages.
info.intro_section_padding_settings: The top and bottom padding above and below the section content.
info.intro_section_password_form: Primary login form used to access a password-protected store. Allow or restrict access with the password protection settings in your [store preferences](/admin/online_store/preferences)
info.intro_section_product_grid: A grid of products with various display settings. Results can be pulled from a selection of products, or a specific collection, or both.
info.intro_section_product_information: Flexible primary product section containing a product’s title, key information, metadata, variants, and add to cart button. Create custom layouts with various available blocks.
info.intro_section_product_recommendations: A set of recommended products built on Shopify’s recommended products API. These recommendations use order history and product information to improve over time. [Learn more](https://shopify.dev/themes/product-merchandising/recommendations)
info.intro_section_register: The primary registration form to create a user account.
info.intro_section_related_posts: Will automatically pull the most recent posts from the current post’s blog. Use a custom blog posts section to create a custom selection of posts.
info.intro_section_rich_text: Simple text- and icon-based section with various display settings.
info.intro_section_rich_text_block_info: Can also be used as a block in the multicolumn, slideshow, or collage sections.
info.intro_section_search_results: Show search results with various filter and layout settings.
info.intro_section_slideshow: A flexible slideshow system comprised of various blocks. Generally used to create custom image or banner slideshows, but various block types can be mixed as needed.
info.intro_section_slideshow_with_text_contro: Slideshow which uses a text and/or icon-based interface to navigate to specific slides. Useful for highlighting product features or details.
info.intro_section_subnav: Anchored menu which will display icon-based navigation.
info.intro_section_testimonials: Displays customer testimonials with links to the related product.
info.intro_section_video: Full-width video section which can be used with Youtube, Vimeo, or self-hosted urls.
info.intro_section_video_with_text: Displays a video next to rich text. Change the order of the blocks to adjust layout.
info.intro_separator: Creates additional space between sections. A line will show in the middle of spacer if a line style is selected.
info.intro_separator_settings: Adjust these settings to show a line at the top or bottom of the section.
info.intro_settings_cards: Default settings for product, collection, and article cards.
info.intro_settings_cart: Default settings for the mini cart and cart page.
info.intro_settings_colors: Colors to be used throughout the site. Be sure your text and background colors meet WCAG accessibility guidelines! [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/accessibility)
info.intro_settings_custom_fonts: Custom fonts can be provided by a service, like Google Fonts or Adobe Typekit, or by uploading the font to your files or an external server. [Learn more](https://companyxyz.io/blogs/theme-settings/custom-fonts)
info.intro_settings_custom_hosted: Custom hosted fonts must be provided in .woff or .woff2 file format. At least one type must be provided; you may provide both for better browser support. Fonts must be appropriately licensed for use!
info.intro_settings_favicon: The small logo in your browser tab or bookmark. Recommended 512x512px dimension; can be transparent .png file.
info.intro_settings_features_bar: For displaying various announcements, features, or important notes in the header, search, and menu items.
info.intro_settings_features_bar_theme_settin: These theme settings will be shown by default when the Features bar section is used, and in search and menu items when applicable. [Learn more](https://companyxyz.io/blogs/sections/features-bar)
info.intro_settings_fonts: Settings for sitewide fonts/typography. Custom fonts can be added below main font settings.
info.intro_settings_free_shipping_threshold: Entice customers to meet a minimum order value. This must also be configured in the [shipping options](/admin/settings/shipping) section of your storefront settings.
info.intro_settings_predictive_search: Powerful real-time search powered by Shopify’s search API. Maximize conversion by enabling users to find what they’re looking for.
info.intro_sidebar_settings: Our proprietary “sniffer” algorithm will scan your article content for links to any products in your store. If it finds any, those products will display in the sidebar.
info.intro_slide_video: Video settings will override image settings. Video will autoplay when slide becomes active.
info.intro_slideshow_settings: The slideshow settings below will only apply if slideshow layout is being used.
info.intro_video_settings: Video settings will override image setting
info.intro_visibility_settings: Optional. Control when this section is shown. Helpful for creating custom mobile layouts.
info.link_style: Choosing a “full block” option will remove any links from subheading text
info.menu_open_action: User action which opens a sub-menu
info.mini_cart_buttons: Checkout option will show button which navigates directly to checkout; view cart option will show button which navigates to the cart page.
info.navigation_link: Optional. Will not be used if menu is set below.
info.pages: Will overwrite blog post if both are set
info.scroll_to_section: Scroll to the reviews section on click.
info.secondary_default_results: The top two levels from this menu will be displayed in the search window’s secondary container. Top-level menu items will be shown as headers.
info.secondary_image: Will display in a second column.
info.secondary_menu: Optional. This menu will show on the right of announcement bar; announcement text will be pushed left.
info.show_banner_menu_item: Will be shown in an open sub-menu
info.show_currency_codes: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.
info.show_dynamic_checkout_buttons: Displays alternative payment buttons to allow customers to quickly buy the product they're viewing. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/dynamic-checkout)
info.show_full-width_menus: Display all menu and mega-menu items in a new row within your navigation. Helpful if you have a lot of menu items.
info.show_full_width: Stretches the accordion to be the full-width of page. If checked, this will automatically override the sticky header setting below.
info.show_on_homepage: Homepage setting will override the sitewide setting
info.show_title: Remember to add an H1 heading with another section or block if unchecked (important for SEO)
info.show_view_all_buttons: Display a button which links to the parent item in each sub-menu.
info.stack_on_mobile: Create column of items on mobile.
info.stretch_content_vertically: Stretch all blocks vertically to fill the full row height
info.subheading_password: Subheading text will show the “Message to your visitors” setting from [store preferences](/admin/online_store/preferences)
info.swipe_on_mobile: Turn section into a slideshow on mobile devices
info.tag: Results will be filtered by the provided tag. Requires selecting blog above.
info.threshold: In your local currency. This will automatically convert into a user’s chosen currency.
info.title_mega_menu: Used at the navigation item title
info.video_poster_image: Recommended if using hosted video. This image will display as the first frame of your video and will fade out when clicked.
info.custom_font_family_h1: Enter the full font-family value, as provided by your font provider. If using a hosted font, the format can be written as: font-family: 'family-name', serif;
info.heading_1_font: Used for all H1 headings, usually as the title of a page
info.custom_font_family_h2: Enter the full font-family value, as provided by your font provider. If using a hosted font, the format can be written as: font-family: 'family-name', serif;
info.custom_font_hosted_woff2: Enter the url to your .woff2 font file
info.heading_2_font: Used for all H2 headings, usually to delineate sub-sections of a page
info.custom_font_family_h3: Enter the full font-family value, as provided by your font provider. If using a hosted font, the format can be written as: font-family: 'family-name', serif;
info.custom_font_family_h4: Enter the full font-family value, as provided by your font provider. If using a hosted font, the format can be written as: font-family: 'family-name', serif;
info.custom_font_family_h5: Enter the full font-family value, as provided by your font provider. If using a hosted font, the format can be written as: font-family: 'family-name', serif;
info.custom_font_family_h6: Enter the full font-family value, as provided by your font provider. If using a hosted font, the format can be written as: font-family: 'family-name', serif;

label.author: Author
label.caption: Caption
label.heading: Heading
label.intro_block_add_to_cart_button: Intro - Block - Add to cart button
label.intro_block_follow_on_shop_button: Intro - Block - Follow on shop button
label.intro_section_features_bar_theme_setting: Intro - Section - Features bar theme settings
label.intro_section_rich_text_block_info: Intro - Section - Rich text block info
label.intro_section_slideshow_with_text_contro: Intro - Section - Slideshow with text controls
label.intro_settings_features_bar_theme_settin: Intro - Settings - Features bar theme settings
label.show_gift_card_recipient: Show gift card recipient information form for gift card products
label.title: Title
